title: Near De Mazenod College- Kandana
details:
22.6 perch available for sale, 500 meters to De Mazenod college,
200 meters to OKI Internationale School Kandana,
1 Km to Kandana Railway Station,
150 Meters to kandana Ganemulla Main bus Route.
1.5 Km to Kandana Town ( Colombo Negombo Main Road)
15 feet wide road, Water, electricity
Calm and peaceful environment with decent neighborhood.
Urgent Sale
